data.Name: Data confidentiality
data.Description: A requirement, specified in a data sale or data sharing agreement, or a joint venture agreement, to hold confidential all data obtained pursuant to the agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data security
data.Description: A specified duty to secure the data against unauthorized or unlawful access.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Data sharing
data.Description: A duty, specified in a JOA or other agreement, to share with all parties the data obtained during the life the agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Delete data
data.Description: A requirement to destroy all data, obtained through an agreement for data sharing or data subscription, after a specified period of time or other conditions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Drilling
data.Description: As set out in an agreement, a requirement to spud or complete a well or wells before a specified date, in specified locations or according to other conditions in the agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Export restriction
data.Description: A limitation on the quantity of product exported to a specific country or countries by a Government.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Financial
data.Description: Obligations for financial payments and accounting are specified in a Joint Operating Agreement, Lease, Purchase and Sale Agreement or other contract.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Intended use of data
data.Description: A requirement that data shared or delivered according to the agreement is used only for specified purposes.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lease termination
data.Description: A requirement to give advance notice to the lessor (permitter) or partners whereby the lessee (permittee) indicates the intention to terminate all or part of the lease.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Limitation on derivatives
data.Description: A restriction on the use of certain products derived from data obtained through purchase or subscription from a third party.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Offset
data.Description: An obligation in some leases that requires the holder of the mineral rights, by virtue of the terms of lease, to drill or take some other action on lands that offset [are adjacent to] acreage found to be productive. The lessor usually issues this obligation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Operations notice
data.Description: [A requirement to issue advance notice] of a proposed operation by a party in writing (usually the Operator) pursuant to an operating agreement to participate or not in the joint operation. The notice has a date in which responses must be received.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Rental
data.Description: [Period payments, usually] including royalties, dues, fees, rates or charges other than money... but does not include money payable as the whole or part of a purchase price.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Reporting
data.Description: A requirement to submit interim, periodic or final reports to other parties in an agreement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Reporting data
data.Description: A requirement to submit data to another party to the agreement. The agreement may define the data types, formats, quality, timing of delivery, etc.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Returning data
data.Description: A requirement to return all data, obtained through an agreement for data sharing or data subscription, after a specified period of time or other conditions.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Royalty
data.Description: A requirement to pay money to a lessor (government or private) or the holder of a non-working interest. The royalty is based on the value of the produced resource. The rate and payment schedule are set out in an agreement (e.g. lease.)
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Surrender notice
data.Description: An application to the lessor (permitter) whereby the lessee (permittee) indicates the intention to terminate all or part of the lease.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Suspension notice
data.Description: Notice given to the lessor that a previously completed well is no longer being produced.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Work commitment
data.Description: Activities and/or expenditures specified in an agreement. These are usually associated with start and/or end dates.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
